titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CD4 CELL COUNT PERFORMED INDICATOR - Description

div.p: CD4 CELL COUNT PERFORMED INDICATOR is the same as attribute PATIENT PROCEDURE PERFORMED INDICATOR, to indicate if the CD4 cell count (an indicator of the progress of an Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) infection) was performed.
For the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set, CD4 CELL COUNT PERFORMED INDICATOR is performed at the HIV Clinic Attendance.
